snippet.textDisplay: I'm glad he dipped into the ethics, this was the first thing I thought of, because that's inevitably how operations work out in the States; either the government and/or some big corpos look to get their hands on it
snippet.textOriginal: I'm glad he dipped into the ethics, this was the first thing I thought of, because that's inevitably how operations work out in the States; either the government and/or some big corpos look to get their hands on it

snippet.textDisplay:
@Devin Mahoney Yeah, and sampling outside a home could really start to kill any sense of privacy or even anonymity. You live in a house with your two roommates. Through house by house sampling the city, and then a private data aggregator, and now your employer has learned that there's a high probability that someone in your house is doing illicit drugs. And the company decides it's not worth the 1 in 3 chance to their insurance and liability, so you're quietly let go.

I get the uses for scientific and public purposes, but without strict regulations, this worries me.
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay: They get that from your cellphone anyways.
snippet.textOriginal: They get that from your cellphone anyways.

snippet.textDisplay: @Devin Mahoney Universal Healthcare solves the insurance problem.
snippet.textOriginal: @Devin Mahoney Universal Healthcare solves the insurance problem.

snippet.textDisplay: I remain hopeful and optimistic of the scientific opportunities but nevertheless my ears are open to the ways a data collection like this could be used unethically..here’s another one he didn’t mention. Does your population show a higher propensity towards unhealthy choices (the molecules/compounds you could test for this could be a very long list) well if you live here health insurance is more expensive…not incredibly invasive but a crack in our personal privacy that can effect the corporate bottom line.

snippet.textDisplay: And here I was thinking that's a treasure trove of data, sample everything, but not to prosecute, just to monitor virus ;)
